attributes.founder: The '''Civic Guard''' is the force that protects the city-state of Qarth. They also serve as bodyguards to the members of the Thirteen, the rulers of the city.==Equipment==Members of the Civic Guard wear bronze armor above their torsos. They carry long lances and round shields.==History=====Season 2===When Daenerys Targaryen and her khalasar arrive the gates of Qarth, a cadre of Civic Guards appear before them to protect the Thirteen.<ref>"Garden of Bones"</ref>The members of the Civic Guard guarding the manse of Xaro Xhoan Daxos are murdered during the robbery of Daenerys' dragons.<ref>"The Old Gods and the New"</ref>== In the books ==In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels, the Civic Guard is commanded by the Pureborn of Qarth. It includes some camelry and works in partnership with the Pureborn fleet== See also ==* AWOIAF==References==ReflistQarthCategory:QarthCategory:OrganizationsCategory:Military organizations

The '''Civic Guard''' is the force that protects the city-state of [[Qarth]]. They also serve as bodyguards to the members of [[the Thirteen]], the rulers of the city.
